Package grafos

Class WeightedGraph

java.lang.Object
grafos.Graph
grafos.WeightedGraph
public class WeightedGraph extends Graph
The WeightedGraph class represents a graph with the weight of each edge. It extends the Graph class and provides additional functionality for weighted edges.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WeightedGraph(int n, int max_n)
    Constructs a WeightedGraph object with the specified number of nodes and maximum weight.

    • createRandomMatrix

      public void createRandomMatrix(WeightedGraph pesoAnt, FeromonasGraph feromonasAnt)
      given the parameters, it creates a random matrix for the weight, and an empty matrix for the pheromones, according to the hamiltonian cycles rules
      Parameters:
      pesoAnt - the graph with the weight of the edges.
      feromonasAnt - the graph with the pheromones of the edges.
